main event: A bright light was observed in the sky over Annapolis and Washington D.C. on June 27, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 20 seconds and was visual,The object was tracked on radar,The object moved towards the east at a speed of 300-600 mph,Witnesses described the light swinging back and forth like a pendulum,There was no physical evidence found to suggest it was anything other than a balloon reflecting celestial lights.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Hotel management and staff in Annapolis, MD
